properties.description: The controlled vocabulary from which the genre term was taken (leave as "aat")
properties.title: Authority

properties.default_value: Online collection published by Barnard Archives and Special Collections, Barnard College.
properties.description: The entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the resource.

The date of creation of the resource. Use this date field if the exact date (whether year, month, and day; year and month; or even just the exact year) is known. Record in YYYY-MM-DD format. (e.g. 1959-05-23 OR 1959-05 OR 1959).
properties.title: Date created

properties.description: Enter the collection from which the photograph comes.

properties.default_value: Contact the Archives at archives@barnard.edu for more information on access and use.

properties.description: The institution or repository that holds the resource or where it is available.
properties.title: Physical location

properties.description: The date or date and time on which the original metadata record was first created. Enter the date in YYYYMMDD format. Do not change on subsequent updates to the record.
properties.title: Creation date
